title: Let Me Guard Your Heart: Book 2
description: If Guarding My Heart left you wanting more I have you covered...Let Me Guard Your Heart is the much-anticipated sequel. Ryan turned my world upside down, his dazzling blue eyes made me weak at the knees. He made me the centre of his world and what did I do after he told me he loves me? I hurt him. Will he forgive me? Do I want him too?Katrina and Ryan’s relationship has taken a drastic turn but Ryan still won’t give up. He has made his feelings clear and will do anything to get her to open up. Katrina wants to be with Ryan but is still unsure if she can fully trust him and when Ryan’s secrets begin to unfold their relationship is put to the test...Fantastic’ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ What an amazing read, it even made me blush in parts. So much excitement on turning each page kept me wanting more. My best read in 2020! ‘HOT!’ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ The author Nadine Hall is very good at grinding this stuff out. I must say, she kept the heat up in my loins from beginning to end. Indeed, if she is half as steamy in real life as the stuff she writes - hey, send me your number, I'll buy you a drink. Maybe a purple rain? (read the book to understand.)Let Me Guard Your Heart is the much-anticipated sequel to Guarding My Heart.
author: N.R. Hall
